Pre-Conditions: App not used before; Clear localStorage
Test Steps:
1. Open app in browser
2. Click "Start nudges" button
3. Observe state changes
Expected Result:
- Button changes to countdown display
- LocalStorage key "breakbreath_active" = true
- Countdown pill appears
- Success toast shown

Test Steps:
1. Click "Try a 30-sec exercise" button
2. Read exercise instructions
3. Click "Start" timer
4. Wait for timer to complete
Expected Result:
- Modal opens with exercise details
- Timer counts down from 30s
- Timer completes with success state
- Exercise marked complete

Test Steps:
1. Click "Office" environment chip
2. Observe chip state
3. Refresh page
4. Check if selection persists
Expected Result:
- Chip shows active state (aria-pressed=true)
- LocalStorage "breakbreath_env" = "office"
- Selection persists after refresh
- Suggestions update for office context

Test Steps:
1. Click "ü´Å Breath" filter chip
2. Click "üëÄ Eyes" filter chip
3. Observe suggestion changes
4. Click "Suggest a move" button
Expected Result:
- Both chips show active state
- Suggestions match selected filters only
- LocalStorage "bb_filters" updated
- Only breath/eyes exercises shown

Test Steps:
1. Start and complete an exercise
2. Observe streak counter
3. Check LocalStorage
Expected Result:
- Daily streak = 1
- Total streak = 1
- LocalStorage "bb_daily_streak" = 1
- LocalStorage "bb_streak_total" = 1
- Success toast shows streak

Test Steps:
1. Look for undo option (check toast/UI)
2. Click undo within 30 seconds
3. Observe streak counter
Expected Result:
- Streak decrements to 0
- Daily streak = 0
- Toast confirms undo
- LastCompletionData cleared

Test Steps:
1. Complete exercise
2. Wait 31 seconds
3. Try to undo
Expected Result:
- Undo option disabled/hidden
- OR message: "Undo window expired (30s limit)"
- Streak remains unchanged

Test Steps:
1. Click snooze button
2. Select "30 minutes" preset
3. Observe UI changes
4. Check LocalStorage
Expected Result:
- Snooze badge appears in header
- Countdown shows remaining time
- LocalStorage "bb_snooze_until" set
- No notifications during snooze

Test Steps:
1. Set snooze
2. Click "Undo" within 30 seconds
3. Observe changes
Expected Result:
- Snooze cancelled immediately
- Badge removed
- LocalStorage "bb_snooze_until" cleared
- Nudges resume

Test Steps:
1. Click settings/gear icon
2. Select "45 minutes" interval (Pro locked)
3. Try custom interval
4. Save settings
Expected Result:
- Free users: 60min only available
- Pro intervals show üîí lock
- Custom interval disabled for free
- Setting persists in LocalStorage "bb_interval"

Test Steps:
1. Click settings
2. Set quiet start: 21:00
3. Set quiet end: 07:00
4. Save settings
5. Check during quiet hours
Expected Result:
- Times saved to LocalStorage
- "bb_quiet_start" = "21:00"
- "bb_quiet_end" = "07:00"
- Badge shows during quiet hours
- No notifications during quiet hours

Test Steps:
1. Open settings
2. Toggle "Show only seated & upper-body exercises"
3. Suggest exercises
4. Verify filter applied
Expected Result:
- Toggle saves to "bb_seated_only"
- Only seated exercises shown
- Toast confirms setting
- Filter persists after refresh

Test Steps:
1. Open any modal (Privacy, Settings, etc)
2. Press TAB key repeatedly
3. Press ESCAPE key
4. Verify focus management
Expected Result:
- Focus cycles through modal elements only
- Focus trap works (doesn't leave modal)
- ESCAPE closes modal
- Focus returns to trigger element

Test Steps:
1. Tab through buttons
2. Check aria-labels present
3. Verify status announcements
Expected Result:
- All icon-only buttons have aria-label
- Status changes announced (aria-live)
- Countdown has aria-live="polite"
- Dialogs have role="dialog"

Test Steps:
1. Click "Unlock Pro" button
2. Observe modal/dialog
3. Verify features list
4. Check analytics (console)
Expected Result:
- Pro modal opens
- All 5 features listed:
  * Quiet hours
  * Custom intervals (10-180 min)
  * Extra move packs (Commute, Full-stretch)
  * One-tap .ics scheduling
  * Streak boosts
- Console shows: [Analytics] pro_cta_click

Test Steps:
1. Click .ics calendar button
2. Observe download
3. Open .ics file in calendar app
Expected Result:
- .ics file downloads
- Filename includes date
- Opens in default calendar app
- Shows hourly recurring events
- Console: [Analytics] cta_add_ics

Test Steps:
1. Complete exercise (streak ‚â•1)
2. Click "Share my streak" button
3. Observe clipboard/share
Expected Result:
- Share dialog or clipboard copy
- Text includes streak count
- Console: [Analytics] cta_share_streak {daily: X, total: Y}
- Toast confirms share

Test Steps:
1. Look for install prompt/icon
2. Click "Install" or use browser menu
3. Install app
4. Launch from desktop/home
Expected Result:
- Install prompt appears
- App installs successfully
- Launches in standalone window
- manifest.json loads correctly

Test Steps:
1. Load app while online
2. Enable Airplane Mode or disconnect network
3. Refresh page
4. Try basic functions (suggest, select env)
Expected Result:
- App loads from cache
- Service Worker serves cached content
- Basic UI functions work
- Environment selection works
- Suggestions display

Test Steps:
1. Go offline
2. Refresh page multiple times
3. Observe console
4. Check SW status
Expected Result:
- Service Worker active
- Cache version correct
- Console shows SW messages
- No network errors for cached resources

Test Steps:
1. Start nudges
2. Allow notifications when prompted
3. Wait for notification
4. Verify notification content
Expected Result:
- Permission prompt appears
- Browser shows "Allowed" status
- Notification appears at interval
- Contains exercise suggestion
- Clicking notification opens app

Test Steps:
1. Deny notification permission
2. Observe app behavior
3. Check UI messaging
Expected Result:
- App continues to work
- No error thrown
- UI shows "notifications disabled" state
- Can use app without notifications

Test Steps:
1. Enable Reduced Motion in OS
2. Refresh app
3. Interact with animations
4. Observe transitions
Expected Result:
- Animations disabled or minimal
- No carousel/sliding effects
- Fade transitions only
- Timer still functional
- No motion sickness triggers

Test Steps:
1. Resize browser to mobile width (~375px)
2. Resize to tablet width (~768px)
3. Resize to desktop (~1440px)
4. Check layout at each size
Expected Result:
- Layout adjusts smoothly
- No horizontal scroll
- Buttons remain accessible
- Text remains readable
- Touch targets ‚â•44px on mobile

Test Steps:
1. Customize multiple settings
2. Click "Restore defaults" (if exists)
3. OR clear browser data
4. Reload app
Expected Result:
- All settings reset to defaults
- Streaks preserved (unless cleared)
- App loads fresh state
- No errors in console

Test Steps:
1. Disable LocalStorage (browser settings)
2. OR fill LocalStorage quota
3. Try to save settings
4. Observe error handling
Expected Result:
- App shows error toast
- Graceful degradation
- No app crash
- User informed of issue

Test Steps:
1. Open browser console
2. Perform actions: start nudges, complete exercise, snooze, etc
3. Watch for [Analytics] logs
Expected Result:
- All actions log to console
- Format: [Analytics] event_name {data}
- No PII in payloads
- 20+ event types tracked
